summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2003 MERCEDES CLK.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE EXTERIOR HEADLIGHTS WOULD FAIL INTERMITTENTLY.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE HEADLIGHT BULB BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 104,000 AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 107,000.
